hero.title: Create an NFT
hero.subtitle: Create a new NFT or continue the creation of an existing contract

hero.title: Continue your NFT
hero.subtitle: Input the contract ID for the contract you want to continue editing

footer.madeContinued: This is a capstone project for our Software Engineering degrees.
footer.location: Proyecto Final - Instituto Tecnológico de Buenos Aires (ITBA)

hero.title: Create, deploy, and interact with your custom NFT contract in just minutes

wallet.title: No Wallet
wallet.description: No setup is needed to create or interact with the contracts!

gas.title: No Gas Fees
gas.description: No Ethereum or upfront fees are required to use this application!

coding.title: No Coding
coding.description: Zero coding is required to create the contract or mint NFTs!

step.title: Step by step explanations
step.description: Each option has a guide, and changes become visible seconds after making them.

simple.title: Simple and Quick
simple.description: In less than 5 minutes, you can have your custom ERC721 smart contract deployed, verified, and ready to start minting tokens with custom metadata.

centralized.title: All in One
centralized.description: You can find everything you might need here! Creation, compilation, verification, adding metadata, contract interaction, and your own NFT gallery.

contract.empty: Start by completing the contract name and symbol...
contract.deploy: Your contract is deployed on address:

error.nameUsed: Name for property already in use

deploy.message: Your contract is now deployed on address {0}. You will be able to see it in the blockchain (it may take a couple of minutes for the block to be mined). You can now verify it, but please wait until the contract is visible. If you edit the contract, you will have to deploy it again.
deploy.error: Error deploying contract. If the Smart NFTs' address is out of gas, please contact the owners of the site, otherwise the transaction hash will provide more information if used in Etherscan.

verify.message: Your contract is now verified. Be mindful, if you edit the contract you will have to deploy it and verify it again.
verify.error: Error verifying contract. If the contract was deployed in the last 5 minutes, please verify the transaction is mined on Etherscan and try again.

loading.initial: Input your contract ID to load it's methods.
loading.initialMethods: Contract methods will appear here once loaded.

error.contractNotDeployed: Contract has not been deployed yet

parameters.name: Name can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore (_)
parameters.symbol: Symbol can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore (_)
parameters.metadataName: This field can only contain letters, numbers, and _
parameters.max20: This field can have a maximum of 20 characters
parameters.boost_percentage: Invalid percentage, must be between 0 and 100 (without %)
parameters.string: Invalid text, maximum length is 256 characters.
parameters.long_string: Invalid text, maximum length is 700 characters.

placeholder.image: Drop the image here or click here to select it...
placeholder.long_string: Long text - Write your long text here

hero.title: 404 - Not Found
hero.subtitle: We couldn't find the page you were looking for, please go back home and start over.

hero.title: 500 - Internal Error
hero.subtitle: There was an internal error, please go back home and start over.
